tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very friendly, approachable doctor I have seen in my life. She will not jump to conclusion. It is very sure she understands the patient's health issues  very well before the recommendations. When one particular medicine didnt work on me, she told me to consume another set of tablets which really solved my issue. I am extremely happy with her approach and the patience with which she takes care of patients. *** ***** *** **** ** **** ******* **** ************. I strongly recommend people with any uterus related issues to consult with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr. Prabha during my daughter-in-law's pregnancy. I found her very calm and understanding. She listens to the problems patiently and tries her best to comfort the patient. The delivery went well and the health of both my grandson and my daughter-in-law are good. I thank a lot to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My appointment  is at 9.50am she came after an hour bcz she is busy in rounds and three patients are waiting before me.  Formal examination done by staff like bp height weight etc...  At least minimum 10 minutes  they took for that.  Later followed by doctor she did not even took more than 7 minutes to me.  As soon as I entered she just smiled and started taking  about my diet and weight. I took appointment just bcz I am suffering from abdominal cramps,  headache and vaginal infection. She did not even asked my problem and when I am trying to explain her she's not in a mood to listen to me.  She doesn't examined me and where I am getting pain and no prescription not even at least one tablet or injection or an ointment. Without listening to me she told me to consult other Doctor Who is nutritionist. And that lady charged 1500 for test and consultant fee just to give me daily diet.  What I am supposed to do when am suffering with pain with your **** **** ******** *** diet. Total 2250 was charged for 2 hours without any treatment. I am writing review for the people who need to consult this doctor, please don't spend your valuable money and time here.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** **** *********** *** ******* **** ********* ** ********. My experience -  This is my 2nd pregnancy, based on my NT scan, she recommended going for a NIPT test and the report was negative. She told everything is fine, nothing to worry about. When I did my anomaly scan in the 20th week of pregnancy, some soft marker was still there, we were very worried and needed honest & clear counseling. Then she is telling us that NIPT doesn't make sense as the fetal fraction count is less and the baby has a chance of chromosomal abnormalities and we don't have any options now. She made us cry the whole night and was worried and stressed for 2 weeks. ** **** *** *** * * ***** ******* **** ******* ******* * *** ******** ******* **** **** *** **** ** ******** *** ******* ** ***** ****** *** **** ** **** *** ***** ** ** **** ** ** **** ***** *** ** *** ** ******* ***** **** **** ****** *** ******** **** **** ** *** ******* ***** ***** **** **** ********* *** **** ******* ** ******* ** ********** * *** ****** ** *** * **** ********* ****** *** *** **** *** *** ** ***** **** *** **** ******* * ******* **** **** This was our mistake and I would never want anyone to go through this experience.

tags: Wait time,
review: This doctor gave me 1 PM appointment, I reached at 12:50. She was dealing with patient till 1:10 PM, She told me to come after 45 minutes. I am working today but she said she can't check me at now but after lunch. How was this my fault, I am paying 700/- as consulting fees and then I have to wait extra hour that too after a legit appointment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor was nice but the staff was unprofessional and doesn't communicate properly. We were told we would need to wait for an hour for the scan and we had to wait for 2 hours and they still couldn't tell me how long I would need to wait. It wasn't the wait that pis**ed me of, it was the staff who couldn't communicate. I finally took a refund of the scan and left the place. Going to a different hospital tomorrow.
reply_text: “Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr.  Prabha Ramakrishmna            We wish you the best of health in the future! “

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr Prabha spends considerable time in understanding patients concerns and history. She then patiently explains the issue, causes and possible treatments. 

We went there for DnC and biopsy of endometirial polyp in my mother’s uterus. We are very satisfied with the treatment and attention given by doctor.
reply_text: “Thank you for taking the time to write this review. Your kind words and appreciation mean a lot to us at Sakra, and we'll be sure to convey your message to Dr. Prabha Ramakrishna   .We wish you the best of health in the future! “

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been knowing this doctor since the beginning of my pregnancy and since then have never felt the necessity of changing the doctor. She hears to each problem patiently and doesn't give unnecessary tests or medicines. Would highly recommend her to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is ****** ************** experienced and patient. Listens carefully and gives valuable suggestions on the most general problems also. I have visited for more than a year while pregnancy and post delivery. Always encouraged me for a normal delivery and healthy practices towards it.  Very satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I attended this doctor today due to a vaginal infection and a swollen vulva.
I gave her a background of my problem and without taking a look a my issue, she sent me to a dermatologist. 
She was very rude since she entered the room and did not even let me finish talking. 
* *** ******* **** ** *** ******* **** *** *** **** ***** *** since she was the only one available today, I had no other option ******** **** * **** **** ***** ** ******* **** * *** **** ********I regret going there.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** ** ********* ****** *** explains complex issues in the simplest manner.  Will needlessly not scare and ask for expensive tests.  Best thing about her is her positive nature and always smiling face. She is very friendly and always ready to answer your most weird questions too.

review:
She was not patient in answering the questions. It was a very unpleasant meeting. 
The doctors might be attending many patients in a day, but if they cannot address the grievance of the patients properly, then why attending the patient? **** *** *** ***** *** ******* ** ****** *** ********** Her consultation fee is 750/-.  I have gone to many doctors in Sakra. This is my first time having a bad experience there.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had abdomen pain .Based on one ultrasound report she decided it's not related to gynaec issue as reports were normal. she did not checked me internally. when I consulted another gynaecologist, she monitored me for couple of months *** ******* ****** ** *********** ** ********** **** ***** *** **** ****** ******

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I was the first patient at 8 40 am and the doctor lands up at 9 50 after doing rounds. Not even slightly apologetic. Why take up pre-booked appointments you can't fulfil? How about informing the patient ? Receptionist says they can't help if doc is busy. If the doc has a job to do, so does a patient. No one is doing anyone a favor.  Highly unprofessional. Surely wont return for someone who has no value for others time.
